We provide highly optimized and scalable managed vps hosting with best SLA uptime. Our hosting packages are developed to give the best of the performances at very affordable prices. Our VPS Hosting services easily replace the shared/reseller hosting services with very less cost effective margin and get optimum results.

Addons:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
1. +512 MB RAM --> € 5 /mo.
2. +50 GB HDD --> € 3 /mo.
3. +1 IP --> € 3 /mo.
4. cPanel/WHM --> € 12.99 /mo.
5. DirectAdmin --> € 12.99 /mo.

Features:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
1. PRIVATE IP ADDRESS :Get Dedicated IP Address with your VPS, allowing you to configure your own custom DNS records and host your business on unique address.

2. ENTERPRISE VIRTUALIZATION: Xen platform provides real hardware virtualization which increases the stability, reliability and customizability. Take full control over virtual machine, OS and Kernel.

3. FREE CPANEL/WHM PANEL: All the Managed VPS`s come with cPanel/WHM installed and optimized, it includes the license bundle without any additional cost. cPanel manage websites, databases and your server.

4. COST EFFECTIVE: We are passionate about providing best services at very affordable prices. Be a freelancer or corporate enterprise, our services suite every need and scalable anytime.

5. PEACE OF MIND: Get any technical assistance around the clock, our heroic support professionals will be available 24/7 take control over your queries. You just need to concentrate on business growth.

6. COMPLETE ROOT ACCESS: We will be providing you complete control over VPS, you will have root access and edit linux OS as you like. We have cpanel pre-installed and configured, still you can install anything.

Help Support:
* Providing Friendly and Very Knowledgeable support to all clients queries.
* LeasedLayer has a Highly Experienced and Qualified Sales/Technical Support Staff.
* LeasedLayer Staff are available 24/7 throughout the year.

Quick Support Methods:
E-mail | Live Support | Phone Support | Skype

We hope you will consider buying from us. If you have any queries do not hesitate to contact us.

Thank You.

Best Regards,
Sneha P - Sales Manager
